tool_description: Compares two database schemas and identifies differences in tables, columns, indexes, constraints, and other database objects.

source_schema.description: JSON string representing the source/current schema metadata

target_schema.description: JSON string representing the target/desired schema metadata

ignore_case.description: Whether to ignore case differences in object names

error_messages: Invalid schema format: Source or target schema is not valid JSON or missing required fields.
Schema parsing error: Unable to parse schema metadata structure.
Empty schema provided: Both source and target schemas must contain valid metadata.
usage: Provide source_schema and target_schema as JSON strings from Schema Extractor. Set ignore_case to true for case-insensitive comparison.

added_tables.description: List of table names that need to be created

dropped_tables.description: List of table names that need to be dropped

modified_tables.description: List of table names that have structural changes

change_summary.description: Human-readable summary of all detected changes
